About music-get

One of the (many) music server implementations for UWCS.

While the other options out there may be a bit shinier, music-get is intended to be an easily maintainable alternative prioritising simplicity over extra features. Made by William Seymour (mcnutty).

The source for music-get is available on github. Feel free to raise an issue or submit a pull request if you spot a bug or want a new feature. The source for the chrome extension can be found under the music-get-autoqueue repo.

The music server falls under the same terms of service as other UWCS services, which is Wheaton's Law.
